headline: Reassessing Digital Realty Trust (DLR) Valuation After Strong Recent Share Price Performance
summary: Why Digital Realty Trust is on investors’ radar Digital Realty Trust (DLR) has drawn fresh attention after a recent move in its share price, with returns over the past month and past 3 months prompting investors to reassess the data center REIT. See our latest analysis for Digital Realty Trust. DLR’s 1 month share price return of 11.15% and 3 month share price return of 13.01% on a latest share price of US$179.59 sits alongside a 3 year total shareholder return of 97.44%. This performance...

headline: VICI Properties' Q4 AFFO Meet Estimates, Revenues Miss, Improve Y/Y
summary: VICI posts higher Q4 AFFO and 2025 growth but misses revenue estimates as other income and golf revenues decline.
